RESOLVED_ENTITIES.vehicles: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: White Malibu sedan stopped by United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino, with observations of its passengers wearing caps and appearing stiff, although the written report did not include these details initially
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck stopped by Officer Reymundo Reyes for failing to use a turn signal on Farm-to-Market Road 2050, searched after IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. gave consent, and had conflicting ownership claims
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGN: Vehicles involved in the incident, including a white Malibu sedan, with observations of repeated off-road driving
